message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a reasonable split.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. How about a 52.5/47.5 split?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is the best I can do for now.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering a 51/49 split. Let's close this deal.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. This is a good compromise.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  An even split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
